title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker discovers the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos in Gotham City.

title: Dune
description: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A chemistry teacher turns into a drug kingpin after a cancer diagnosis.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families fight for control of the Iron Throne.

title: Stranger Things
description: Kids uncover supernatural mysteries in their small town.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter travels through the outer reaches of the galaxy.

title: The Boys
description: A group fights corrupt superheroes.

title: Peaky Blinders
description: A gangster family rises to power in post-war England.

title: Fight Club
description: An underground fight club becomes something much more.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a man with a low IQ who achieves great things.

title: The Social Network
description: The founding of Facebook and the legal battles that followed.

title: Chernobyl
description: A dramatization of the true story of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators help a family terrorized by a dark presence.

title: Annabelle
description: A possessed doll terrorizes a young family.

title: The Nun
description: A priest uncovers a dark secret at a Romanian abbey.

title: Incantation
description: A mother tries to protect her daughter from a deadly curse.

title: The Curse of La Llorona
description: A terrifying apparition stalks children after a curse is unleashed.

title: Insidious
description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their child.

title: Munafik
description: A religious healer faces supernatural forces tied to dark faith.

title: Malam Terlarang
description: A forbidden ritual unleashes terrifying consequences.

title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
description: A group of horror streamers enter a haunted asylum.
